label: 北山抄
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: This lengthy court ritual text was compiled at the beginning of the 11th c. by the famous literati Fujiwara no Kintō (966-1041), and depicts annual observances of the court as well as many other rituals. At least part of the work was written on behalf of his son-in-law 藤原教通 Fujiwara no Norimichi (997-1076), son of Michinaga (966-1027) and later chancellor.
